subject: You Can Do It!
text:
Dear Employees of Qualia,
You can do it! We are so close to our milestones! We know that we push you hard here at Qualia to do great, but we believe that great people can do great things! Just last month, we received a new grant for a high level project that will institute social change on the deepest level. Imagine being part of something so fantastic. Remember, that you are here for the greatest purpose of all. We look forward to your continued service. Thank you and keep at it!
Sincerely,
Your Qualia Family
